Package clientSide.gui

Class DepartmentManagerReportsScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.controllers.AbstractScreen
      • clientSide.gui.DepartmentManagerReportsScreenController
  • public class DepartmentManagerReportsScreenController
extends AbstractScreen
    Controller for the Department Manager Reports Screen. This class is responsible for handling user interactions with the screen for generating and viewing various reports related to park visitations.

      • totalNumberOfVisitorsReport

        private void totalNumberOfVisitorsReport​(java.lang.String selectedMonth,
                                         java.lang.String selectedYear,
                                         java.lang.String selectedParkName)
        Generates and displays the Total Number of Visitors report for a selected park, month, and year. This method first verifies the existence of the selected park and checks if the report data is available for the given time period and park. If the data is available, it proceeds to generate the report.
        Parameters:
        selectedMonth - The code of the month for which the report is to be generated.
        selectedYear - The year for which the report is to be generated.
        selectedParkName - The name of the park for which the report is to be generated.

      • usageReport

        private void usageReport​(java.lang.String selectedMonth,
                         java.lang.String selectedYear,
                         java.lang.String selectedParkName)
        Generates and displays a usage report for a specific park, month, and year. This method validates the existence of the park based on the selected name and checks if the park manager has available data for the specified period. If the data is available, it retrieves usage statistics.
        Parameters:
        selectedMonth - The month for which the report is being generated.
        selectedYear - The year for which the report is being generated.
        selectedParkName - The name of the park for which the report is being generated.

      • cancellationReport

        private void cancellationReport​(java.lang.String selectedMonth,
                                java.lang.String selectedYear,
                                java.lang.String selectedParkName)
        Generates and displays a cancellation report for a specific park, or all parks collectively, for a given month and year. The method handles both individual park data and aggregated data for all parks. It checks for report availability before generating or displaying the data.
        Parameters:
        selectedMonth - The month for which the cancellation report is being generated.
        selectedYear - The year for which the cancellation report is being generated.
        selectedParkName - The name of the park for the cancellation report, or "All Parks" for aggregated data.

      • visitReport

        private void visitReport​(java.lang.String selectedMonth,
                         java.lang.String selectedYear,
                         java.lang.String selectedParkName)
        Generates and displays a visitation report for either a specific park or aggregated across all parks, based on user selection for a particular month and year. This method ensures the selected park exists checks report data availability, and then displays the visitation data.
        Parameters:
        selectedMonth - The month for which the visit report is being generated.
        selectedYear - The year for which the visit report is being generated.
        selectedParkName - The name of the park for the visit report, or "All Parks" for aggregated data.
